programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: Ernest Saves Christmas
programme.desc: Ernest scrambles to find a successor for Santa Claus in this Yuletide comedy.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: As Good as It Gets
programme.desc: James L. Brooks' acclaimed romantic comedy about a plucky New York waitress (Helen Hunt) and a phobic, curmudgeonly novelist (Jack Nicholson). Greg Kinnear costars as his gay neighbor in this story of love, forgiveness and acceptance. The three leads were Oscar-nominated. Cuba Gooding Jr., Skeet Ulrich, Shirley Knight.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: Steel Magnolias
programme.desc: Robert Harling adapted and expanded his stage hit, a character study set in small-town Louisiana that celebrates friendship among a group of strong-willed women who discuss their lives—especially the shortcomings of their men—at Truvy's beauty salon. Julia Roberts earned her first Oscar nomination as Best Supporting Actress for her portrayal of stubborn Shelby. Harling costars as the minister.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: Heaven Can Wait
programme.desc: A quarterback's soul is mistakenly sent to heaven after an accident, and his body is cremated. Before long, he's given a new body on Earth and sparks a relationship with an activist who's against his persona's bad practices. Based on the play by Harry Segall. Remake of "Here Comes Mr. Jordan."

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: Teen Wolf
programme.desc: A misfit, picked-on teen's life turns around when he discovers he's descendant from a line of werewolves. By unleashing his inner beast, he becomes a basketball star, and works up the courage to try and win his dream girl away from her unpleasant boyfriend.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: Smokey and the Bandit
programme.desc: The Bandit, a charismatic bootlegger, takes a bet to ship a truck full of beer from Texas to Arkansas. While pulling off the stunt, he falls in love with a woman engaged to the son of a dyspeptic sheriff who takes it upon himself to stop Bandit.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: Mr. Malcolm's List
programme.desc: Jeremy Malcolm is the most sought bachelor in the English countryside. Rumors surface of a list that lays out all the perfect qualities for Mr. Malcolm's future wife. A suitor from out of town hears about Mr. Malcolm and is convinced she can win him over. Based on the novel Mr. Malcolm's List by Suzanne Allain.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: Love Means Zero
programme.desc: Featuring the life and work of American tennis coach Nick Bollettieri.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: A Little Game
programme.desc: A 10-year-old girl wants to learn how to play chess in order to defeat a rival at school. She takes lessons from an elderly man who's a master at the game, and the pair eventually bond.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: Muhammad Ali: The Greatest. Of All Time.
programme.desc: Muhammad Ali talks a suicidal stranger down from a ledge, using his unique brand of wit and wisdom.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: The Real Charlie Chaplin
programme.desc: A raw and striking portrait of noteworthy silent film actor Charlie Chaplin. Never-before-seen clips from Chaplin's candid interview with Life Magazine in 1966 sheds light on the actor's upbringing and unexpected foray into the entertainment industry. The interview, woven together with clips from Chaplin's films, provides a meditation on Chaplin's impact on Hollywood from the actor's own perspective.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: The House of Mirth
programme.desc: Strong performances, gorgeous costumes and sumptuous art direction distinguish this adaptation of Edith Wharton's novel. Gillian Anderson stars as a unmarried woman who falls from grace in early 20th-century New York City, where the upper classes have little use for an independent female who refuses to play by the rules. Eric Stoltz, Anthony LaPaglia, Laura Linney, Dan Aykroyd, Elizabeth McGovern.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: The Nanny Diaries
programme.desc: Scarlett Johansson stars in this hilarious adaptation of the bestseller. A recent college grad takes a job as a live-in nanny for the troubled son of a snooty, neurotic Upper East Side socialite and her nasty, adulterous husband. Laura Linney, Alicia Keys, Chris Evans, Donna Murphy, Paul Giamatti. Directed by Shari Springer Berman and Robert Pulcini.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: Saving Flora
programme.desc: A circus Elephant named Flora who can no longer perform her tricks is scheduled to be euthanized. However, the night before, Dawn, the circus owner's 14-year-old daughter, escapes from the circus together with Flora to take her away from danger. Dawn's mission is to take Flora to the elephant preserve where she will be safe from any harm. To achieve it, they will need to make it through kilometers of woods, an enraged river, and two elephant hunters.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: Hit the Road
programme.desc: This Iranian film follows a mother, father and their two sons: a young adult and a child as they hit the road in an overloaded SUV for a journey across the country. The reason for the mysterious journey is not known at first but as time moves on its dark purpose is revealed.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: Forrest Gump
programme.desc: Six Oscars, including Best Picture and Actor (Tom Hanks), went to this extraordinary tale of a simple man who unwittingly becomes involved in some of the key moments of the 20th century. Meanwhile, as the remarkable parade of his life goes by, Forrest never forgets Jenny, the girl he loved as a boy, who makes her own journey through the turbulence of the 1960s and '70s that is far more troubled than the path Forrest happens upon.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: The Nanny Diaries
programme.desc: Scarlett Johansson stars in this hilarious adaptation of the bestseller. A recent college grad takes a job as a live-in nanny for the troubled son of a snooty, neurotic Upper East Side socialite and her nasty, adulterous husband. Laura Linney, Alicia Keys, Chris Evans, Donna Murphy, Paul Giamatti. Directed by Shari Springer Berman and Robert Pulcini.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn - Part 1
programme.desc: In this magical installment of the "Twilight" saga, Bella becomes pregnant after marrying Edward, which leads to a dangerous childbirth and a shocking realization for werewolf Jacob Black.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn - Part 2
programme.desc: The sweeping conclusion to the "Twilight" series follows Bella, Edward and Jacob as they band together to fight a group of ancient vampires who are threatening to destroy Bella and Edward's family.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: Finding Neverland
programme.desc: Seven Oscar nominations, including Best Picture and Best Actor went to this magical portrait of Scottish playwright J.M. Barrie. The film chronicles his relationship with a young widow and her sons, which inspired "Peter Pan."

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: For Your Consideration
programme.desc: From Christopher Guest and Eugene Levy, the creators of "Best in Show" and "A Mighty Wind," comes this witty satirical look at the Hollywood hype machine and the making of an independent film.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: Menashe
programme.desc: This moving drama centers on a Hasidic Jewish man living in New York City who fights to retain custody of his son after his wife's death, as tradition dictates that the boy must be raised in a household with a mother. If he doesn't remarry quickly, his son will be adopted by his late spouse's stern brother.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: The Fits
programme.desc: An isolated 11-year-old girl joins a dance drill team at her local rec center, but her newfound friends and teammates begin to suffer from mysterious fainting episodes.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: Rhapsody of Love
programme.desc: Wedding planner Jess prefers to help couples achieve happy endings rather than find romance for herself. However, she inadvertently catches the eye of Justin, the photographer at one of her events, and the two cannot ignore their chemistry. As Jess and Justin's paths intersect once again at a local film festival, Jess begins to reconsider her opinions on love while navigating life as a young professional.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: Kate & Leopold
programme.desc: Meg Ryan and Hugh Jackman are charming in this time-tripping romantic comedy. Jackman plays the Duke of Albany, who is whisked through a portal in time from 1876 to modern-day Manhattan, where a romance begins when he woos a jaded executive (Ryan). Directed by James Mangold ("Girl, Interrupted"). Liev Schreiber, Breckin Meyer, Natasha Lyonne.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: The Twilight Saga: New Moon
programme.desc: This thrilling second installment of the popular "Twilight" saga finds Bella Swan in pieces after her vampire boyfriend leaves town. She soon reconnects with a childhood friend and realizes he's hiding a dark secret that may hold the key to her survival.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: The Twilight Saga: Eclipse
programme.desc: The third installment of the electrifying "Twilight" saga finds Bella (Kristen Stewart) forced to choose between Edward (Robert Pattinson), a vampire and the love of her life, or Jacob Black (Taylor Lautner), a werewolf and her best friend. The result of her decision may reignite the ancient feud between vampires and werewolves, while a scorned vampire bent on revenge appears responsible for a string of brutal murders

programme.title: Win a Date With Tad Hamilton!
programme.desc: Robert Luketic ("Legally Blonde") directed this cheery comedy about a self-centered movie star (Josh Duhamel) who tries to repair his bad-boy image by dating a naive fan (Kate Bosworth). No one is more surprised than the star when he begins to fall for the small-town girl. Nathan Lane, Sean Hayes, Gary Cole.

programme.title: Failure to Launch
programme.desc: In this breezy romantic comedy, the exasperated parents of a 35-year-old ladies' man who won't move out of the house hire a woman who specializes in convincing men to leave the nest.

programme.title: High Fidelity
programme.desc: John Cusack is in a groove as the owner of a Chicago used-record store in this smart 2000 romantic comedy. It's the story of a man who reflects on his messy love life while paying meticulous attention to all things vinyl. The charmer is based on the novel by Nick Hornby. Iben Hjejle, Jack Black, Todd Louiso, Joan Cusack, Tim Robbins, Lisa Bonet.

programme.title: Just Like Heaven
programme.desc: An architect sublets an apartment in San Francisco and finds it haunted by the ghost of its former tenant, who refuses to accept that she's dead. Reese Witherspoon and Mark Ruffalo sparkle in this divinely romantic comic fantasy. Donal Logue, Dina Waters, Ben Shenkman.

programme.title: Celeste and Jesse Forever
programme.desc: In this poignant romantic comedy, a successful media consultant named Celeste decides to divorce her lazy husband Jesse and focus on her career, but she later realizes that ending their relationship might have been an impulsive mistake.

programme.title: Failure to Launch
programme.desc: In this breezy romantic comedy, the exasperated parents of a 35-year-old ladies' man who won't move out of the house hire a woman who specializes in convincing men to leave the nest.

programme.title: Men at Work
programme.desc: Sanitation workers witness an altercation through a telescope and find a city official's body in the trash at the same location the next day; they fear being implicated and try to solve the case themselves.

programme.title: Jacob's Ladder
programme.desc: A Vietnam War veteran struggles with flashbacks and hallucinations. With the help of his new bride, he fights to keep sane while his brain fluctuates between reality and delusion.

programme.title: The Relic
programme.desc: A brain-hungry entity runs amok in a dank museum in this gory creature feature starring Penelope Ann Miller. It's up to biologist Margo Green (Miller) and Det. Vincent D'Agosta (Tom Sizemore) to end the lizardy brain-drainer's reign of terror. Linda Hunt, James Whitmore, Clayton Rohner, Chi Muoi Lo, Thomas Ryan, Robert Lesser, Diane Robin.

programme.title: Dickie Roberts: Former Child Star
programme.desc: David Spade is a hoot in this clever satire about a '70s TV icon who is desperately searching for another shot at fame and fortune. Mary McCormack and Jon Lovitz costar. The film is a Who's Who of former child stars, including Alyssa Milano, Danny Bonaduce, Willie Aames, Fred Berry, Todd Bridges, Barry Williams, Dustin Diamond, Tony Dow and Corey Feldman.

programme.title: A Very Brady Sequel
programme.desc: The '70s-trapped Bradys must travel to Hawaii to save the family after Carol's first husband shows up and threatens their idyllic existence. As Carol is torn between two husbands, Mike struggles to hold the family together and Alice cooks a lot of meat loaf. Shelley Long, Gary Cole, Tim Matheson, Christopher Daniel Barnes, Christine Taylor, Paul Sutera, Jennifer Elise Cox, Henriette Mantel.

programme.title: High Fidelity
programme.desc: John Cusack is in a groove as the owner of a Chicago used-record store in this smart 2000 romantic comedy. programme.title: Celeste and Jesse Forever
programme.desc: In this poignant romantic comedy, a successful media consultant named Celeste decides to divorce her lazy husband Jesse and focus on her career, but she later realizes that ending their relationship might have been an impulsive mistake.

programme.title: The Presidio
programme.desc: A police detective investigates a murder at the Presidio Army base in San Francisco with the help of his former commander officer, with whom he had a dramatic falling-out years earlier.

programme.title: Witness
programme.desc: A Philly cop investigates a murder witnessed by a young Amish boy. He flees with the boy to Amish country to protect him, and falls for the boy's widowed mother.

programme.title: Vanilla Sky
programme.desc: Tom Cruise reunited with director Cameron Crowe ("Jerry Maguire") for this mind-bending remake of the 1997 Spanish drama "Abre los ojos." Cruise plays the heir to a publishing fortune whose life is turned upside down after a horrific car accident. During his recovery, fantasy and reality begin to blend in his mind. Cameron Diaz, Penelope Cruz, Jason Lee, Kurt Russell, Noah Taylor.

programme.title: Road to Perdition
programme.desc: A betrayed mob hit man goes the lam with his son, and seeks revenge against vicious gangsters. As the bullets start to fly, the impressionable child is exposed to the goriest aspects of his father's talents in this gorgeously stylized action thriller.

programme.title: Wild Things
programme.desc: A popular high school counselor (Matt Dillon) is charged with raping the most popular girl (Denise Richards) in school---a charge that leads investigators into a bizarre maze of deceit and debauchery. Neve Campbell, Kevin Bacon, Theresa Russell, Daphne Rubin-Vega, Robert Wagner, Bill Murray, Carrie Snodgress, Jeff Perry, Cory Pendergast, Marc Macaulay, Toi Svane.

programme.title: Witness
programme.desc: A Philly cop investigates a murder witnessed by a young Amish boy. He flees with the boy to Amish country to protect him, and falls for the boy's widowed mother.

programme.title: American Gigolo
programme.desc: Julian is a stylish and successful male prostitute whose life goes downhill when he's framed for murder after doing a pimp a favor. The only person he can trust is a politician's wife who is frustrated with her husband, and is the only woman he sleeps with who doesn't pay for his services.

programme.title: Lifeguard
programme.desc: Sam Elliott has the title role in this story of a California beachboy pondering a sea change in his lifestyle. Cathy: Anne Archer. Larry: Stephen Young. Chris: Parker Stevenson. Wendy: Kathleen Quinlan. Machine Gun: Steve Burns. Tina: Sharon Weber. Mrs. Carlson: Lenka Peterson. Directed by Daniel Petrie.

programme.title: The General's Daughter
programme.desc: Complex drama about an Army warrant officer (John Travolta) investigating the apparent rape and murder of the daughter of a politically ambitious base commander. Madeleine Stowe. James Woods steals several scenes as an intense colonel. William Goldman ("Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid") co-wrote the script from Nelson DeMille's novel. Simon West directed.

programme.title: Vanilla Sky

Cameron Diaz, Penelope Cruz, Jason Lee, Kurt Russell, Noah Taylor.

Neve Campbell, Kevin Bacon, Theresa Russell, Daphne Rubin-Vega, Robert Wagner, Bill Murray, Carrie Snodgress, Jeff Perry, Cory Pendergast, Marc Macaulay, Toi Svane.

programme.title: Clockstoppers
programme.desc: Jesse Bradford and French Stewart star in this cute family fantasy about a teen who discovers that a special watch invented by his father has the ability to freeze time. But he finds himself battling sinister forces after his dad is kidnapped. Paula Garces, Michael Biehn, Robin Thomas.

programme.title: A.I. Artificial Intelligence
programme.desc: The minds of two cinematic geniuses meld in this visionary sci-fi epic directed by Steven Spielberg and based on a treatment by Stanley Kubrick. Haley Joel Osment is extraordinary as a robot programmed to have human emotions. After he is abandoned by his adoptive parents, he sets out to become a real boy.

programme.title: Black Nativity
programme.desc: In this contemporary classic based on the timeless play, a Baltimore teen rebels against his religious New York relatives during Christmas, and returns home to his friends and single mother to learn an important lesson about faith.

programme.title: Dr. Seuss' How the Grinch Stole Christmas
programme.desc: Jim Carrey is inspired as the mean, green Grinch in director Ron Howard's enchanting big-screen adaptation of Dr. Seuss's beloved children's fantasy. The classic holiday tale is vividly brought to life as the coldhearted Grinch plots to rob Whoville of its Yule celebration by masquerading as Santa and stealing all the presents.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Secrets of Dumbledore
programme.desc: With the sinister Gellert Grindelwald wreaking havoc worldwide, Professor Albus Dumbledore must seek aid if he is to thwart the dark wizard's schemes. Dumbledore faces Grindelwald and the dark wizard's acolytes in an all-out battle for the greater good with the help of the charming Newt Scamander and Scamander's ragtag team of allies.

programme.title: The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug
programme.desc: Thorin Oakenshield and his band of dwarves, along with Bilbo Baggins and Gandalf, continue their crusade to reclaim Erebor from the dragon Smaug in this sweeping fantasy that picks up where the events of "The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey" left off.

programme.title: King Richard
programme.desc: Family man Richard Williams recognizes the athletic prowess brimming in his daughters Venus and Serena, inspiring him to develop an unorthodox training plan to propel the girls to international recognition as Black female tennis aces. Based on a true story.

programme.title: HBO First Look: Empire of Light
programme.desc: An inside look at Sam Mendes' romantic drama starring Olivia Colman, Micheal Ward, Monica Dolan, Tom Brooke, Tanya Moodie, Hannah Onslow, Crystal Clarke, Toby Jones, and Colin Firth.

programme.title: Across the Universe
programme.desc: A trippy magical mystery tour that grooves to more than 30 Beatles songs performed by the cast. Evan Rachel Wood is an American named Lucy and Jim Sturgess plays Liverpudlian Jude, who falls in love with Lucy against the backdrop of the turbulent 1960s. Directed by Julie Taymor, who co-wrote the screenplay with Dick Clement and Ian La Frenais. Featured: performances by rock icons Joe Cocker ("Come Together") and Bono ("I Am the Walrus," "Lucy in the Sky with Diamonds").

programme.title: Jurassic Park
programme.desc: Genetically engineered dinosaurs run amok on a remote island in this special-effects extravaganza. It's up to a paleontologist, a paleobotanist and a mathematician to outmaneuver the deadly beasts and find their way back to civilization. Based on Michael Crichton's best seller. The film won three Oscars, including Best Visual Effects.

programme.title: The League of Extraordinary Gentlemen
programme.desc: Seven literary characters join together to save powerful world leaders in this ripping yarn based on the comic-book series. Sean Connery is outstanding as intrepid explorer Allan Quatermain, who heads the group that includes Captain Nemo (Naseeruddin Shah), Tom Sawyer (Shane West) and Dorian Gray (Stuart Townsend).

programme.title: Transcendence
programme.desc: In this ingenious sci-fi thriller, an AI expert's consciousness is transferred into a computer after he is killed. As his awareness goes viral, he becomes an unstoppable force inhabiting every computer and electrical system on the planet.

programme.title: The Matrix Resurrections
programme.desc: This sci-fi series sequel revisits Neo, who seems to be feeling disconnected from his reality as he discusses his personal issues with a therapist-like Analyst. As he's also apparently taking some blue pills, people from his past start reappearing, offering him a red pill and some missing truths about his actual reality.

programme.title: Non-Stop
programme.desc: An air marshal pursues a hijacker on a nonstop flight from New York to London in this hair-raising thriller. When the mysterious villain begins killing passengers, the marshal becomes the prime suspect and must fight to clear his name.

programme.title: Death on the Nile
programme.desc: While vacationing in Egypt, detective Hercule Poirot finds himself in the thick of a love triangle that goes awry. However, when a wealthy young woman winds up dead, it is up to Poirot to track down the killer before he or she can claim a new victim. Based on the novel of the same name by Agatha Christie.

programme.title: Amsterdam
programme.desc: In the 1930s, Burt, Valerie, and Harold are three friends who endure a life-altering turn of events. Upon witnessing a grisly murder, the trio unwittingly finds itself as the prime suspects in the case, inspiring them to find the true murderer before they find themselves behind bars.

programme.title: We're Here
programme.desc: The queens are back in towns as Bob the Drag Queen, Shangela and Eureka travel the USA, enrolling residents for one-off drag shows.

programme.title: Riddick
programme.desc: In this exhilarating sci-fi sequel, escaped convict Riddick battles vicious aliens and ruthless mercenaries on a barren planet as a deadly storm approaches.

programme.title: Random Acts of Flyness
programme.sub-title: Fifth Dimension: The Parable of the Pirate & the King

programme.title: Random Acts of Flyness
programme.sub-title: Sixth Dimension: All Possibilities of Together & Apar

programme.title: The Making Of: F9: The Fast Saga
programme.desc: Inside the making of the newest installment in the "Fast and Furious" franchise.

programme.title: Jerrod Carmichael: Rothaniel
programme.desc: Jerrod Carmichael returns for his third stand-up special taped before a live audience at the legendary Blue Note Jazz Club in New York City.

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: The Crawley family prepares for an official royal visit to their family house in Yorkshire in 1927. They experience physical, social, and psychological upheavals as King George V, Queen Mary, and their royal entourage descend on the eponymous mansion.

programme.title: Maid in Manhattan
programme.desc: Jennifer Lopez and Ralph Fiennes team up for comedy and romance in this charming Cinderella story. Lopez stars as a chambermaid at a posh New York hotel who has a whirlwind affair with a wealthy politician (Fiennes) who thinks she is a socialite. Natasha Richardson, Stanley Tucci, Tyler Posey, Frances Conroy.

programme.title: The Bob's Burgers Movie
programme.desc: When a large sinkhole emerges in front of the Belchers' restaurant, the family must consider permanently closing their business. Determined to protect their father's lifelong dream, the Belcher children band together to uncover the root of an unusual enigma that possesses the key to protecting their family's business. Based on the television series of the same name.

programme.title: HBO First Look: Empire of Light
programme.desc: An inside look at Sam Mendes' romantic drama starring Olivia Colman, Micheal Ward, Monica Dolan, Tom Brooke, Tanya Moodie, Hannah Onslow, Crystal Clarke, Toby Jones, and Colin Firth.

programme.title: Daredevil
programme.desc: Ben Affleck and Jennifer Garner make a sizzling duo in this dark and sexy adaptation of the Marvel comic. Affleck plays the blind lawyer-turned-superhero who takes on Kingpin and his rogues' gallery of villains to avenge the death of his father. Garner heats things up as the leather-clad Elektra, the daughter of a slain shipping tycoon who is out for some payback of her own.

programme.title: Branson
programme.desc: The history of Virgin Galactic, from conception to test flights, and the controversial bid from Virgin Atlantic to obtain government support during the Covid-19 pandemic. As the first passenger flight of Virgin Galactic approaches, Branson defends the benefits of privately funded space exploration and the paradoxes around Virgin's eco-messaging. Set for July 11, 2021, the launch day follows 17 years of research, testing, accidents, and setbacks, culminating in a successful flight.

programme.title: Hard Knocks In Season: Arizona Cardinals
Belfast
programme.desc: It is 1969 and 9-year-old Buddy finds his peaceful life disturbed as a national conflict is starting to brew in Northern Ireland: unionists and loyalists—mostly Protestants—want the country to remain within the United Kingdom, while nationalists and republicans—mostly Catholics—are campaigning for the country to join a united Ireland. As the tension between these two opposing forces escalates, he and his family must decide whether to stay, or move somewhere safe.

programme.title: FX's A Christmas Carol
programme.desc: Ebenezer Scrooge experiences a dark night of the soul in an original take on Charles Dickens' iconic ghost story.

programme.title: A Christmas Carol
programme.desc: A first-rate adaptation of Charles Dickens' classic novel about Ebenezer Scrooge, a London miser who, despite his wealth, refuses to make charitable contributions and treats his sole employee, Bob Cratchit, as an indentured servant. On Christmas Eve, Scrooge is visited by the ghost of his selfish business partner, Jacob Marley, and then by three more spirits that same night, an experience that forever changes his life.

programme.title: FX's A Christmas Carol
programme.desc: Ebenezer Scrooge experiences a dark night of the soul in an original take on Charles Dickens' iconic ghost story.

On Christmas Eve, Scrooge is visited by the ghost of his selfish business partner, Jacob Marley, and then by three more spirits that same night, an experience that forever changes his life.

programme.title: The Keys of the Kingdom
programme.desc: A Scottish priest finds it difficult to retire from his work in Civil War-era China, but upon returning to his homeland he finds a new purpose in life: Ministering to youngsters who, like him, have trouble determining their place in the world.

programme.title: Susannah of the Mounties
programme.desc: An orphan, who survived an Indian attack, becomes an ambassador for peace between the Blackfeet and the Canadian Mounties.

programme.title: The Silver Whip
programme.desc: Low-budget yarn about bandits vs. a stagecoach line. Dale Robertson, Rory Calhoun, Robert Wagner. Kathy: Kathleen Crowley. Bowen: James Millican. Waco: Lola Albright. Riley: J.M. Kerrigan. Harmon Jones directed.

programme.title: The Gambler from Natchez
programme.desc: Costume tale of the Mississippi river-boat days. Debra Paget plays her usual spitfire to Dale Robertson's vengeful hero. Andre: Kevin McCarthy. Captain Barbee: Thomas Gomez. Yvette: Lisa Daniels. Josh: Woody Strode. Claude: Douglas Dick.

programme.title: The Reward
programme.desc: There's more talk than action in this tale of a man (Efrem Zimbalist Jr.) fleeing from a murder rap in Mexico. Max von Sydow, Yvette Mimieux. Joaquin: Henry Silva. Carbajal: Gilbert Roland. Luis: Nino Castelnuovo. Lopez: Emilio Fernandez. Serge Bourguignon directed.

programme.title: The Last Hard Men
programme.desc: Charlton Heston as a retired sheriff hunted by a killer out to avenge his wife's death. James Coburn, Barbara Hershey. Menendez: Jorge Rivero. Nye: Michael Parks. Shelby: Larry Wilcox. Shiraz: Morgan Paull. Weed: Thalmus Rasulala. Brickman: Christopher Mitchum. Gant: John Quade. Directed by Andrew V. McLaglen.

programme.desc: Laurie Strode comes out triumphant in her showdown with Michael Myers after she leaves him burning in a cage in her basement. Though badly injured, she begins to feel a sense of relief, thinking she has finally gotten rid of her lifelong tormentor. When the bloodbath resumes, she is alerted that the evil serial killer has survived and that once again, she has to gear up to take him on. This time, however, Haddonfield rallies behind her, intent on eliminating Michael once and for all.

programme.title: The Purge: Anarchy

programme.title: William Shakespeare's Romeo + Juliet

Leonardo DiCaprio, Claire Danes, Brian Dennehy, John Leguizamo, Pete Postlethwaite, Paul Sorvino, Diane Venora, Harold Perrineau, Paul Rudd, Jesse Bradford, Dash Mihok.

programme.title: Ghost Ship

Jim Broadbent earned a Best Supporting Actor Oscar as her doting husband, John Bayley. Hugh Bonneville, Penelope Wilton.

programme.title: The Purge: Anarchy
programme.desc: In this edge-of-your-seat sequel, a young couple must fight to survive after their car breaks down in the city during a night when all crime is legal.

programme.title: Love and Monsters

As Joel realizes that there's nothing left for him underground, he decides against all logic to venture out to Aimee, despite all the dangerous monsters that stand in his way.

programme.desc: A woman falls in love with a soldier about to ship out, and her mother wants to spare her heartache similar to what she felt when her husband was killed on active duty, so the mom tries to persuade her daughter to end the romance.

Nelson, Rachel McAdams, Luke Wilson, Tyrone Giordano, Brian White.

programme.title: Outlander
programme.desc: Following celebrations in honor of Brianna and Roger's wedding, Governor Tryon reminds Jamie of his obligation to hunt down and kill Murtagh Fitzgibbons.

programme.title: Outlander
programme.desc: Jamie continues to hunt Murtagh and his band of Regulators, with a dedicated lieutenant and a contingent of redcoat soldiers at his side. When a settler at the Ridge dies of a preventable illness, Claire is inspired to take action.

programme.title: Outlander
programme.desc: The growing Regulator threat forces Jamie, Claire and Roger to embark on a mission to raise a militia.

programme.title: Outlander
programme.desc: Roger leads Jamie's militia to the trading post of Brownsville and finds himself embroiled in a bitter feud. Jamie and Claire arrive to find that Roger's unusual strategy may have cost them the loyalty of the militia.

programme.title: All Is Bright
programme.desc: In this warmhearted buddy comedy, a Canadian ex-con teams up with a gigolo to sell Christmas trees in New York City so he can purchase a piano for his estranged daughter.

However, Fred seems to have a different plan in mind. The interviewee suddenly becomes the interviewer, and he starts to help the writer sent for him in unexpected ways.

programme.desc: Peter Parker is now unmasked, his identity as Spider-Man known to the world. In a way, he likes it that his girl MJ knows his true identity, the same with his best friend Ned and Aunt May. However, problems follow this reveal. Thus, Peter approaches Doctor Strange to help him resolve the situation by performing a specific time-altering ritual. But that also bears some unintended and problematic consequences.

programme.title: Power Book III: Raising Kanan
programme.desc: A surprise encounter with Howard leaves Kanan rattled. Raq tries to expand into new territory, but when an associate and valuables go missing, she is reunited with an old adversary. Lou continues to butt heads with Crown.

programme.title: Power Book III: Raising Kanan
programme.desc: Jukebox and Kanan look for answers in family matters. When Raq's push into another territory is stalled, she proposes a meeting.

programme.title: John Tucker Must Die

programme.desc: In this star-studded period drama, two con artists are recruited by an FBI agent to infiltrate the treacherous world where New Jersey's politics and the mob intersect. However, it's never quite clear who is the swindler and who is the mark.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels
programme.desc: Elena, a young engineer, unwittingly stumbles upon new government technology that could prove dangerous for society. However, her discovery garners attention from the wrong sort of people. Now it's up to two special operatives to step in and protect the future of the planet.

Together, they team up to break a curse that casts Lena's entire future in doubt.

programme.title: An American Haunting
programme.desc: Donald Sutherland and Sissy Spacek star in this chilling ghost story based on the documented case of a family in early 19th-century rural Tennessee that is haunted by an evil spirit. James D'Arcy, Rachel Hurd-Wood. Directed by Courtney Solomon.

programme.title: Halloween Kills
programme.desc: Laurie Strode comes out triumphant in her showdown with Michael Myers after she leaves him burning in a cage in her basement. Though badly injured, she begins to feel a sense of relief, thinking she has finally gotten rid of her lifelong tormentor. When the bloodbath resumes, she is alerted that the evil serial killer has survived and that once again, she has to gear up to take him on. This time, however, Haddonfield rallies behind her, intent on eliminating Michael once and for all.

programme.title: The Purge: Anarchy
programme.desc: In this edge-of-your-seat sequel, a young couple must fight to survive after their car breaks down in the city during a night when all crime is legal.

programme.title: William Shakespeare's Romeo + Juliet

Leonardo DiCaprio, Claire Danes, Brian Dennehy, John Leguizamo, Pete Postlethwaite, Paul Sorvino, Diane Venora, Harold Perrineau, Paul Rudd, Jesse Bradford, Dash Mihok.

programme.title: Ghost Ship

Jim Broadbent earned a Best Supporting Actor Oscar as her doting husband, John Bayley. Hugh Bonneville, Penelope Wilton.

programme.title: Next
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage stars in this explosive action thriller about a Las Vegas magician who's enlisted by an FBI agent (Julianne Moore) to help prevent a terrorist attack because he can see two minutes into the future. Jessica Biel, Thomas Kretschmann, Tory Kittles. Directed by Lee Tamahori.

programme.title: Unfinished Song
programme.desc: In this affecting and uplifting love story, a cranky retiree discovers he has a gift for song after he takes his dying wife's place in a quirky choir that performs contemporary hits instead of tiresome standards.

programme.title: Mona Lisa Smile
programme.desc: Julia Roberts heads a strong ensemble cast in this moving drama about the power of individuality. Roberts plays a progressive 1950s Wellesley College art professor, who runs afoul of the faculty when she teaches her students to reach for the stars.

programme.desc: A motormouthed high-school security guard joins his girlfriend's brother, a decorated police officer, on a ride-along through the mean streets of Atlanta in this wild action comedy. In the process, he learns that life on the force is no picnic.

programme.desc: This explosive, energetic crime opus, set in a glitzy Lake Tahoe hotel, rides shotgun with a wild collection of assassins as they gun for lowlife magician Buddy "Aces" Israel (Jeremy Piven), who is turning state's evidence against the mob. Ben Affleck, Ray Liotta, Ryan Reynolds, Taraji Henson, Andy Garcia, Peter Berg. Wayne Newton has a cameo as himself. Singer Alicia Keys and rapper Common make their big-screen debuts. Written and directed by Joe Carnahan.

Laura Linney, Caroline Dhavernas, Gary Cole.

programme.desc: A boy's fantasies about a monster living in his bedroom closet are close to the mark due to a series of unsolved murders in the neighborhood. Stefanie Powers, Mickey Toft, Margot Kidder.

programme.desc: Five years after her son was killed, a woman begins dating again, but a one-night romance with a handsome soldier throws her life back into chaos as the young man's attraction turns out to be a frightening obsession.

programme.desc: After narrowly escaping the clutches of a deadly stalker, a beautiful young woman flees to a remote anonymous town where she rebuilds her life and finds the man of her dreams—until the man of her nightmares tracks her down.

programme.desc: Single mom Sarah moves into the suburbs and starts dating a firefighter, only to find herself the target of an obsessive neighborhood watchman who aims to prove he's the best man to protect her, even if he has to create the danger himself.

programme.title: Obsession: Stalked By My Lover
programme.desc: Madison Turner chooses 20-year-old Blake Collins as her new roommate. They hit it off and their friendship soon turns romantic. What Madison doesn't know is that Blake is now using Madison and her wealthy sister Evie to pull off the ultimate score that will set him up for life. When Madison and Evie discover that Blake isn't who he says he is, Madison begins to dig into Blake's past.

programme.title: Obsession: Escaping My Ex
programme.desc: When Blake Collins manages to escape a prison van in Detroit, his only goal is to make it back to Philadelphia and find Madison, the woman he loves but betrayed, resulting in his capture by the cops. He sets his nefarious plan into action, kidnapping Madison who will fight to the death to escape his clutches.

programme.title: In the Good Old Summertime
programme.desc: Two clerks in a turn-of-the-20th-century Chicago sheet-music store are intensely antagonistic toward each other, but unbeknownst to the two, they actually are getting very chummy as pen pals. A musical remake of "The Shop Around the Corner," in which the setting was changed from a Budapest sundries shop.

programme.title: How to Steal a Million
programme.desc: An art forger's daughter unwittingly enlists the aid of a detective to rob a museum, and he plans on arresting all of them when the job is done.

programme.title: The Thomas Crown Affair
programme.desc: Larceny mixes with romance in this caper film about a millionaire (Steve McQueen) who masterminds a bank heist for fun and then enters into a game of cat and mouse with the insurance investigator (Faye Dunaway) assigned the case. Michel Legrand's score was Oscar nominated, and the song "The Windmills of Your Mind" was named Best Song.

programme.title: The Hot Rock
programme.desc: A former jewel thief agrees to steal back from a museum a diamond that was taken in colonial times from an African village.

programme.title: Ocean's 11
programme.desc: Frank Sinatra, Dean Martin, Sammy Davis Jr. and the rest of the Rat Pack do it their way in the classic original version of the caper flick. Ol' Blue Eyes is Danny Ocean, a playboy who rounds up his old army buddies for a military-style heist in Vegas. The plan: Ring-a-ding in the New Year with a rip off of five casinos. Peter Lawford, Angie Dickinson, Richard Conte.

programme.title: Dollars
programme.desc: Warren Beatty and Goldie Hawn in a spoof about crooks robbing crooks, with a West German bank as the target. Richard Brooks directed on location in Hamburg, Bavaria and Scandinavia. Kessel: Gert Frobe. Attorney: Robert Webber. Sarge: Scott Brady. Candy Man: Arthur Brauss.

programme.title: Bringing Up Baby
programme.desc: Screwball comedy about a dog with a taste for dinosaur bones, a housebroken leopard named Baby, a madcap heiress who sets her cap for an absent-minded paleontologist, and a wacky menagerie of secondary characters.

programme.title: The Philadelphia Story
programme.desc: In this Best Picture nominee, Katharine Hepburn re-creates her Broadway role as a divorced society woman preparing for her wedding while fending off the advances of a magazine reporter and her ex-husband. Playwright Philip Barry's comedy of manners captures "the privileged class enjoying its privileges" and landed Donald Ogden Stewart a Best Screenplay Oscar and James Stewart a Best Actor award as the journalist.

programme.title: My Favorite Wife
programme.desc: A woman returns home to her husband and their children after being marooned on a desert island for seven years. But she has been declared legally dead, and he now has a second wife.

programme.title: Plymouth Adventure
programme.desc: Epic re-creation of the Pilgrims' turbulent voyage to the New World aboard the Mayflower, captained by a stubborn seaman who promises to reach his destination come hell, high water or any other obstacle. An Oscar winner for special effects.

programme.title: Ambush
programme.desc: A civilian scout riding with the U.S. cavalry in 1878 Arizona Territory attempts to track down a general's daughter who's been abducted by Apaches.

programme.title: Lafayette Escadrille
programme.desc: WWI saga of the American flying unit of the French Air Corps. Tab Hunter. Renee: Etchika Choureau. Drillmaster: Marcel Dalio. Tom: Jody McCrea. Duke: David Janssen. Bill: Bill Wellman Jr. Outstanding aerial photography. Directed by William A. Wellman.

programme.title: A Distant Trumpet
programme.desc: Young Lt. Hazard is assigned to a fort on the border of Arizona and Mexico where he must deal with the undisciplined troops. He falls for his commanding officer's wife and gets caught up in a massive battle.

programme.title: Mutiny on the Bounty
programme.desc: Remake of the 1935 film classic stars Marlon Brando as Fletcher Christian, the British naval officer who, in 1789, leads a revolt against an abusive, tyrannical ship captain in the South Pacific. A Best Picture nominee remade again in 1984 as "The Bounty," with Mel Gibson as Christian.

programme.title: Seven Women
programme.desc: Story of U.S. missionaries besieged by Mongolian bandits on the China border in 1935. John Ford's last film.

programme.title: Madadayo
programme.desc: Akira Kurosawa character study chronicles two decades in the life of a beloved teacher-writer (Tatsuo Matsumura) and the students who've graced his classroom. Wife: Kyoko Kagawa. Takayama: Hisashi Igawa. Amaki: George Tokoro. A.k.a. "Not Yet."

programme.title: The Liberation of L.B. Jones
programme.desc: An African-American funeral director is murdered when he seeks a divorce from his wife, who is having an affair with a white police officer.

programme.title: Parade Show
programme.desc: Featuring interviews with stars and clips of MGM films.

programme.title: Background to Danger
programme.desc: Barton, an American agent working undercover in neutral Turkey during WWII, receives documents of plans for a supposed Russian invasion. Soon Barton and two Russian siblings must combat a ruthless Nazi agent. Based on the novel by Eric Ambler.

programme.title: The Conspirators
programme.desc: A Dutch freedom fighter named Vincent joins a group of conspirators after fleeing to Lisbon to escape the Nazis. The leader of the conspirators informs Vincent that a Nazi mole is hiding among their group, and tasks Vincent with finding the traitor.

programme.title: The Mask of Dimitrios
programme.desc: Mystery novelist Cornelius Leyden is on vacation in Istanbul when the body of master criminal Makropoulos washes up on shore. Leyden becomes inspired to learn and tell the story of Makropoulos' rise to power, traveling across Europe to uncover secrets and stitch together the criminal's narrative. Based on the novel "A Coffin for Dimitrios" by Eric Ambler.

programme.title: Three Strangers
programme.desc: Two men and one woman form a strange partnership on the Chinese New Year.

programme.title: The Woman in White
programme.desc: In 1851 England, a young artist goes to a grand estate to give painting lessons to a beautiful young woman, only to discover an eccentric cast of characters filling out the house.

programme.title: Flamingo Road
programme.desc: An ex-carnival dancer marries a society man to get revenge on a corrupt politico who had her railroaded into prison on a trumped-up morals charge.

programme.title: Pillow to Post
programme.desc: During World War II, a free-spirited traveling saleswoman induces an officer to pose as her husband in order to secure suitable lodgings at a motor camp catering exclusively to married servicemen.

programme.title: The Spanish Princess
programme.desc: A new religion is on the rise, as is tension at court. Catherine must stop Henry's paranoia from turning friends into enemies.

programme.title: The Spanish Princess
programme.desc: Henry descends into madness and the stakes have never been higher for Catherine, as her husband becomes a threat to her life.

programme.title: Parallel Mothers
programme.desc: In a maternity ward, two women of disparate backgrounds find their lives entwining in an unexpected way. Middle-aged Janis eagerly awaits her new arrival as Ana, a traumatized teen, fears what the future may hold for her and her new child. As the women navigate the trials of childbirth and the impending expectations of motherhood, they develop an intricate, complex bond that irrevocably alters the course of their lives.

programme.desc: This true story recounts the compilation of the Oxford Dictionary in 1857, as begun by a professor and his team. But to their amazement, one of the largest contributors was an American Civil War veteran in an asylum who had added over ten thousand words.

Directed by Rodrigo García.

programme.title: Caged
programme.desc: An abusive female guard pushes a man to the limit in prison after he is found guilty of murdering his wife. Haunted by demons and placed in solitary confinement, he finds himself at his breaking point.

programme.desc: Aging jockey Jackson refuses to admit that his body can no longer withstand the demands of the sport. When rookie jockey Gabriel arrives at the track, Jackson feels inspired by the young man's grit and vows to claim one final championship before his time is up, all the while grappling with an unexpected revelation from Gabriel.

programme.title: Dirty Pretty Things
programme.desc: Gritty, socially conscious thriller about an illegal Nigerian immigrant in London who becomes embroiled with a black-market ring selling human organs.

programme.title: Never Look Away
programme.desc: A German artist is haunted by the state-ordered sterilization and murder of his mentally ill aunt with the Nazi rule a forever reminder of the tragedy. programme.title: Show Me the Father

programme.title: Boundaries
programme.desc: After Jack is thrown out of his retirement home, his daughter Laura and her son Henry agree to drive him from Seattle to L.A, to stay with her sister. Unbeknownst to Laura, Jack and Henry begin to quietly sell off a supply of marijuana along the way.

programme.title: Jockey

programme.title: I Carry You With Me
programme.desc: This drama is based on the real-life story of gay Mexican couple Ivan and Gerardo. While in Mexico, Ivan hides his gayness for fear of being deprived of visitation rights to see his son with an ex. He decides to try his luck and enters America illegally as an undocumented immigrant. He lands in New York, where Gerardo also follows suit. In New York, the two find it challenging to achieve the American dream, but they could now be openly gay.
Recalling the rise and fall of New York's drug-and-sex-filled disco scene of the late '70s, from the perspective of a 19-year-old hustler.

programme.desc: A chilling mix of war-ravaged reality and fairy-tale magic marks this phantasmagorical yarn, in which a girl in 1944 fascist Spain escapes her hellish surroundings and sadistic stepfather by completing a series of trials in an imaginative fantasy realm.

programme.desc: The story of a boy from the streets who falls for a wealthy deaf girl. Frankie dreams of a better life for himself and his nephew. programme.title: Better Luck Tomorrow

Lin's film, which he helped finance by maxing out 10 credit cards, is based on a 1992 murder. Sung Kang, Jason Tobin, Karin Anna Cheung.

programme.title: Nine Days
programme.desc: At a waystation in a remote desert, Will, an arbiter, interviews prospective souls for rebirth. Yet the sudden death of a treasured soul upends Will's fragile, unusual existence. programme.title: The Devil's Double
programme.desc: Iraqi soldier Latif Yahia is selected to be a body double for Saddam Hussein's ruthless son Uday, but things get tense when Latif finds himself increasingly drawn to Uday's ravishing mistress.

The soldiers soon begin to question their role in suppressing the riots while remaining cognizant of the racial undercurrents of the violence.

programme.desc: A battered wife is stalked by her abusive husband after faking her death to start a new life.

programme.desc: The growing Regulator threat forces Jamie, Claire and Roger to embark on a mission to raise a militia.

programme.desc: Roger leads Jamie's militia to the trading post of Brownsville and finds himself embroiled in a bitter feud. Jamie and Claire arrive to find that Roger's unusual strategy may have cost them the loyalty of the militia.

programme.desc: Lloyd Vogel is tasked with creating a profile of Fred Rogers, the creator and star of the successful children's program Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. As they are about to find out, this reclusive hidden community zealously guards their privacy and territory—to the death.

programme.title: S.O.S. Survive or Sacrifice
programme.desc: Two estranged sisters reunite on a Mediterranean Island and agree to an exciting ride on a hot air balloon with the locals. But when a freak accident carries the balloon out to sea, the group find themselves battling for survival. Soon, the situation begins spiraling out of control, marking their lives forever.

programme.title: Public Enemy (feat. Kev Wells)
programme.desc: Stranded by their driver and unable to get to the show, rap legends Public Enemy are rescued by Kev, a 50-year-old Sheffield super-fan and unlikely savior who offers them a lift in his run-down economy car. A funny and thought-provoking take on fandom and the randomness of human connection.

programme.title: Spotlights: A Showtime Short Film Series
programme.sub-title: Tea Time on Hip Hop Nation
programme.desc: A classical radio host interviews for a job at Hip Hop Nation.

programme.title: Spotlights: A Showtime Short Film Series
programme.desc: A pregnant vegan wrestles with her newfound craving for meat. An exploration of the ethics of meat-eating and the fears inherent in becoming a parent.

programme.title: Immanence
programme.desc: Radio astronomers discover a mysterious signal in the deep sea that could be contact with extraterrestrials. After several terrifying manifestations threaten their beliefs, the team must fight to survive the ultimate evil.

In small-town Illinois, aspiring filmmaker Pat Johnson contends with the pitfalls of adolescence, from bullying to young love. However, when he discovers a new science fiction film, he may find himself at the center of events much greater than himself. Based on true events.

programme.title: Mob Town
programme.desc: In 1957, an FBI agent teams up with a local police officer to monitor the activities of New York City's most notorious Mafia leaders as they prepare for a large-scale gathering in upstate New York. It is up to the unlikely duo to piece together the purpose of such a meeting and thwart any instances of violence that may erupt as a result.

programme.title: NYC Point Gods
programme.desc: Against the backdrop of New York City's epidemic of drugs and crime in the 1980s and 1990s, a unique style of basketball emerged on the city's courts, defined by toughness, talent and swagger.

programme.title: Infinite Storm
programme.desc: The thriller tells the true story of professional climber Pam Bales. Facing an impending blizzard on her way down from Mount Washington, Bales discovers a stranded man in need of help. She undertakes the impossible mission of saving his life. With their lives on the line, they must leave the mountain together before nightfall.

programme.title: Adrift
programme.desc: A young couple who's sailing 4,000 miles across the Pacific Ocean suddenly find themselves approaching a Category 5 storm with no hope of diverting. After losing consciousness, she awakes stranded on their wrecked boat, but with a determined will to survive.

programme.title: Matt Rogers: Have You Heard of Christmas?
programme.desc: A yuletide extravaganza of soon-to-be-classic songs and comedy sketches.

programme.title: 13 Minutes
programme.desc: Deep in America's heartland, a substantial tornado touches down, wreaking havoc across a rural town and leaving the community destitute. Amidst the destruction and devastation, four close-knit families band together to survive their harsh new reality and face a future fraught with uncertainty.

programme.title: Contagion
programme.desc: In this intense ensemble thriller about a virus that quickly becomes a global pandemic, a husband (Matt Damon) copes with the sudden death of his wife, while a doctor (Kate Winslet) puts herself at risk to find a cure and an activist blogger (Jude Law) stokes society's paranoia. Directed by Steven Soderbergh.

programme.title: Best of All the Smoke with Matt Barnes and Stephen Jackson
Bellator MMA
programme.desc: Hometown favorite and top welterweight Michael "Venom" Page faces Logan Storley in London, where "MVP" last won a split decision over Douglas Lima. Storley had a career-defining win over Neiman Gracie last out. Plus, Lyoto Machida vs. Fabian Edwards (middleweights).

programme.title: An American Werewolf in London
programme.desc: On vacation in England with his friend, an American tourist ignores the locals' warnings and walks out after dark; he is attacked and becomes a werewolf.

programme.title: Student Body
programme.desc: Jane tries to restore her shattered friendship with Merritt, her childhood best friend. A disinterested high school administration compels Jane and Merritt to take matters into their own hands, further fracturing their relationship.

programme.title: Monstrous
programme.desc: Laura, the mother to seven-year-old Cody, decides to get a new but isolated house near a lake. They are trying to live a new life after escaping Laura's abusive ex-husband. Amidst the appeal of their life and surroundings, a new challenge appears in the form of a monstrous being that emerges from the waters near their property, haunting them in more ways than one.

programme.title: Dead in Tombstone
programme.desc: A gang overruns a small mining town, murder their own leader all for a cold-blooded power grab. Guerrero finds himself confronted by Satan offering him a proposition to deliver the six souls of his former gang and he will escape damnation.

programme.title: National Champions
programme.desc: With their university's reputation on the line, a football team prepares for the most critical match of their season. However, the team's charismatic and talented quarterback leads his brothers into a strike moments before kick-off, spurring a crusade for equal opportunities amongst all student athletes at their institution.

programme.title: McEnroe
programme.desc: The story of a legend told by the legend himself: John McEnroe. Nobody embodied the rockstar era of tennis more than John McEnroe. The original bad boy of the sport, McEnroe was famous not only for his epic matches, but also for his confrontations on and off the court. Accompanied by interviews with icons like Patty Smyth, Keith Richards, Billie Jean King, and Bjorn Borg, the legendary tennis ace gives an unflinching account of his triumphs, struggles, friendships, and rivalries.

programme.title: Ida Red
programme.desc: After being given 20 years in prison for armed robbery, career criminal Ida "Red" Walker fears that she won't survive long enough to see through her sentence due to being diagnosed with a terminal illness. Intent on staging one last heist, she turns to her son and right hand Wyatt to help her bring her plans to completion, and to give her a chance to regain her freedom.

programme.title: The Trust
programme.desc: Two Las Vegas police officers discover a mysterious safe installed inside a grocery store while investigating a drug ring. The oddball duo hatch a scheme to steal its contents, but they quickly get in over their heads in this thrilling crime caper.

programme.title: It Comes at Night
programme.desc: In this unnerving horror film, a married couple and their teenage son isolate themselves from the rest of humanity when a plague throws civilization into chaos. However, their secluded existence is threatened when a young family seek shelter with them.

programme.title: Monstrous
programme.desc: Laura, the mother to seven-year-old Cody, decides to get a new but isolated house near a lake. They are trying to live a new life after escaping Laura's abusive ex-husband. Amidst the appeal of their life and surroundings, a new challenge appears in the form of a monstrous being that emerges from the waters near their property, haunting them in more ways than one.

programme.title: The Host
programme.desc: This Korean take on the "Godzilla" legend is an alternately spine-tingling and rib-tickling creature feature about a dysfunctional Korean family trying to rescue their prized daughter (Ko Ah-sung), who's been snatched by a mutant monster and taken to its lair. Song Kang-ho, Bae Doo-na. Directed by Bong Joon-ho, who co-wrote the script with Baek Chul-hyun.

programme.title: Snowpiercer
programme.desc: A revolution brews on a train containing the last of humanity in this thrilling sci-fi film set during a new ice age. When the lower classes in the back cars invade the upper classes in the front, the superpowered locomotive speeds toward tragedy.

programme.title: Nothing Compares
programme.desc: An intimate look into the life of controversial Irish singer-songwriter Sinéad O'Connor. Beginning with the release of her debut album in 1987, the narrative charts six years in O'Connor's career filled with rebellion, iconoclasm, and creativity as the musician strove to rewrite the script of mainstream music and femininity in the face of rampant sociopolitical and sociocultural change.

programme.title: Surge
programme.desc: Over the course of 24 hours, an airport security worker embarks on a self-destructive and impulsive rebellion throughout London. Having borne the brunt of emotional alienation and economic exploitation, he experiences a sense of release and self-fulfillment through the breakdown of his sanity.

programme.title: Murina
programme.desc: Julija, a teenage girl who puts up with her controlling father, goes on a weekend trip with one of his friends. Julija's father, Ante, makes a living by diving in the Adriatic Sea and fishing for moray eels. When her father's friend and potential buyer, Javier, whisks her away, Ante starts to worry about the land deal he is about to close.

programme.title: My Salinger Year
programme.desc: Joanna lands a job as an assistant to Margaret, J.D. Salinger's literary agent, after she leaves graduate school in order to pursue her dream to become a writer. Her main task is to process the immense amount of fan mail the famous writer receives from day to day and reply with a template answer. However, as she goes through each one, she cannot help but be moved by some. She then decides to forgo impersonal responses and write her own replies.

programme.title: The Circle
programme.desc: A young woman lands a job at a social-media company that preaches the value of complete transparency and inspires a cult-like devotion in its employees. However, she learns that they're hiding a nefarious agenda in this timely and unnerving thriller.

programme.title: Inside Llewyn Davis
programme.desc: A homeless folk singer seeks success in Greenwich Village in the early 1960s, but faces hardship and disappointment during a harsh winter in this captivating period drama. Later, he takes a road trip to Chicago in the hope of impressing a club owner who could give him his big break.

programme.title: Time Now
programme.desc: A young mother returns to her estranged hometown of Detroit after the sudden death of her twin brother and immerses herself in his friend group, soon discovering that his death is not what it seems.

programme.title: Inbetween Girl
programme.desc: A teenage girl turns to secret hookups after her parents' divorce.

programme.title: The Circle
programme.desc: A young woman lands a job at a social-media company that preaches the value of complete transparency and inspires a cult-like devotion in its employees. However, she learns that they're hiding a nefarious agenda in this timely and unnerving thriller.

programme.title: North Hollywood
programme.desc: North Hollywood resident Michael is a teenager who's active in many things like any young boy his age, namely hanging out with his buddies, doing various sports like water polo, even being active in their church. Skateboarding remains high on his list, so much so that he plans to make it as a professional in this field. But his father is pressuring him to focus on his studies so he can go to college.

programme.title: S.F.W.
programme.desc: An idler becomes a celebrity as a result of surviving an ordeal as a hostage.

programme.title: Last Call
programme.desc: Real estate tycoon Mick ventures back to his close-knit Philadelphia suburb, revisiting his former haunts. He later receives an offer to develop the neighborhood's beloved watering hole, forcing him to consider the future of the property as he entertains the notion of resurrecting the family bar.

programme.title: Jackass Number Two
programme.desc: Johnny Knoxville, Steve-O and the rest of the gang are back for another round of dangerous stunts and depraved pranks in a sequel that's even more extreme than the first movie.

programme.title: Benny Loves You
programme.desc: After losing his parents due to a fatal accident, Jack decides to throw out all his childhood possessions as he makes plans to sell off his family home. This triggers Benny, his once-beloved plushie, to come to life as a homicidal knife-wielding maniac.

programme.title: Afflicted
programme.desc: Two young travel bloggers attempting to document their journey around the world experience a bizarre encounter that leaves one of them instilled with superhuman powers in this inventive sci-fi thriller. Now, they must find the woman who infected him during a one-night stand gone awry.

programme.title: The Go-Go's
programme.desc: As the first multi-platinum-selling, all-female band to play their own instruments, write their own songs and soar to number one on the album charts, the Go-Go's are the most successful female rock band of all time. Underpinned by candid testimonies from The Go-Go's past and present, this documentary chronicles the meteoric rise to fame of a band born of the L.A. punk scene that not only captured but created a zeitgeist.

programme.title: Last Call
programme.desc: Real estate tycoon Mick ventures back to his close-knit Philadelphia suburb, revisiting his former haunts. He later receives an offer to develop the neighborhood's beloved watering hole, forcing him to consider the future of the property as he entertains the notion of resurrecting the family bar.

programme.title: Even More Funny Women of a Certain Age
programme.desc: Golden Globe winner Teri Hatcher hits the stage with some of the funniest women in comedy for a night of over-the-top, uninhibited standup. Starring no-holds-barredpros Carole Montgomery, Wendy Liebman, Leighann Lord, Monique Marvez and Marsha Warfield.

programme.title: Midnight Sun
programme.desc: A sheltered girl named Katie has a rare disease that makes exposure to sunlight deadly. A chance encounter with her childhood crush, Charlie, leads to an unlikely summer romance that gets complicated when Katie finally reveals her medical condition.

programme.title: The Gasoline Thieves
programme.desc: Mexican teenager Lalo wants to impress his crush by buying her a new smartphone. To make quick and easy cash, he begins working for a gang of local huachicoleros, who siphon off fuel then illegally sell the stolen gas on the black market. He soon finds himself in over his head with investigators on his trail.

programme.title: Twilight
programme.desc: Stephenie Meyer's romantic and suspenseful best seller that started the phenomenon comes to life in this action-packed chronicle of the modern-day love story between a teenage girl and a vampire. Kristen Stewart and Robert Pattinson star. Billy Burke, Peter Facinelli, Elizabeth Reaser. Directed by Catherine Hardwicke.

programme.title: Wonderful Time of the Year, A
programme.desc: The Marsh family is getting together for their first Christmas Eve after three years of pandemic lockdown.

programme.title: Robotapocalypse
programme.desc: A quirky family grapples with an incursion of sinister artificial intelligence that puts a damper on their summer road trip.

programme.title: Demonic
programme.desc: This sci-fi horror tale finds the characters crossing the line of reality and existing in an environment where they begin to question their own existence. The story follows a woman who has long been estranged from her mother. However, during the course of a technological experiment, the paths of the mother and daughter meet again, as secrets of their lives slowly emerge while supernatural demons are accidentally unleashed by the process.

programme.title: Depeche Mode 101
programme.desc: Filmmaker D.A. Pennebaker captures the music and spirit of the English alt-rock group Depeche Mode and the vibrant fandom that surrounded the band on their 1988 world tour. The documentary climaxes with a concert at the Rose Bowl in Pasadena, Cal.

programme.title: The Twilight Saga: Eclipse
programme.desc: The third installment of the electrifying "Twilight" saga finds Bella (Kristen Stewart) forced to choose between Edward (Robert Pattinson), a vampire and the love of her life, or Jacob Black (Taylor Lautner), a werewolf and her best friend. The result of her decision may reignite the ancient feud between vampires and werewolves, while a scorned vampire bent on revenge appears responsible for a string of brutal murders

programme.title: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn - Part 1
programme.desc: In this magical installment of the "Twilight" saga, Bella becomes pregnant after marrying Edward, which leads to a dangerous childbirth and a shocking realization for werewolf Jacob Black.

programme.title: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn - Part 2
programme.desc: The sweeping conclusion to the "Twilight" series follows Bella, Edward and Jacob as they band together to fight a group of ancient vampires who are threatening to destroy Bella and Edward's family.

programme.title: Boogie Nights
programme.desc: Exploration of the adult-film industry in the '70s and early '80s, about the rags-to-riches career of a naive teen who's transformed into a star by a wily producer.

programme.title: Matt Rogers: Have You Heard of Christmas?
programme.desc: A yuletide extravaganza of soon-to-be-classic songs and comedy sketches.

programme.title: Thank You for Your Service
programme.desc: In this gripping drama, a group of U.S. soldiers return home after serving in Iraq in this perceptive drama, but their attempts at reintegrating into civilian life are complicated by their traumatic memories of war and pressure from military brass to remain stoic.

programme.title: Last Vegas
programme.desc: Four geriatric friends head to Las Vegas for a bachelor party that recaptures the magic of their glory days in this outrageous all-star comedy.

programme.title: The War With Grandpa
programme.desc: When Grandpa Ed comes to stay, his grandson Peter must give up his beloved bedroom. However, Peter does not give way so easily, concocting a series of unexpected and unusual schemes to force his imposing grandfather out of his room for good. Based on the novel by Robert Kimmel Smith.

programme.title: The Switch
programme.desc: This delightfully offbeat comedy centers on a single woman who decides to conceive via artificial insemination. But seven years later, she reunites with a friend and comes to question the child's paternity after he recalls a last-minute mix-up involving the sperm sample she used.

programme.title: Snake Eyes
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage stars in this highly stylized 1998 thriller directed by Brain De Palma. Cage plays a crooked cop investigating the assassination of the Secretary of Defense, who was shot at a championship boxing match in Atlantic City. As the investigation proceeds, he is forced to realizes that one of his closest friends (Gary Sinise), a Navy commander, may have been involved.

programme.title: Dead For A Dollar
programme.desc: The western centers on bounty hunter Max Borlund and his fateful confrontation with lifelong nemesis Joe Cribbens. Borlund ventures into Mexico to pursue the kidnapped wife of a wealthy man. But on his journey, he reunites with Cribbens years after he sent him to jail.

programme.title: The SHOW: California Love, Behind the Scenes of the Pepsi Super Bowl Halftime Show
Adam Sandler's Eight Crazy Nights
programme.desc: A partying troublemaker learns about holiday spirit when a judge sentences him to community service as a referee for a kids team.

programme.title: Cold Mountain
programme.desc: Nicole Kidman, Jude Law and Best Supporting Actress Renée Zellweger star in Anthony Minghella's sweeping Civil War epic about a pampered preacher's daughter struggling to survive while waiting for her beau to return from battle.

programme.title: Kate & Leopold
programme.desc: Meg Ryan and Hugh Jackman are charming in this time-tripping romantic comedy. Jackman plays the Duke of Albany, who is whisked through a portal in time from 1876 to modern-day Manhattan, where a romance begins when he woos a jaded executive (Ryan). Directed by James Mangold ("Girl, Interrupted"). Liev Schreiber, Breckin Meyer, Natasha Lyonne.

programme.title: The Switch
programme.desc: This delightfully offbeat comedy centers on a single woman who decides to conceive via artificial insemination. But seven years later, she reunites with a friend and comes to question the child's paternity after he recalls a last-minute mix-up involving the sperm sample she used.

programme.title: The Amityville Horror
programme.desc: In this terrifying remake, a couple think they've found a dream house in Amityville, Long Island, but they soon learn that the home has a dark history. A year before, a man living in the house murdered his family in their sleep, claiming he was commanded to commit the crime by demons.

programme.title: Becky
programme.desc: After her mother's death, 13-year-old Becky goes on a weekend getaway with her father, Jeff, to bond and reconnect with him. Jeff, however, has a different plan—he brings along his new girlfriend Kayla in an attempt to bring her closer to Becky. However, when four newly-escaped prisoners show up and break into the lake house they are staying at, their plans change, and the fun trip becomes a nightmare. Becky now has to do everything she can to keep the three of them safe.

programme.title: Begin Again
programme.desc: An ambitious female singer moves to NYC in search of stardom, but finds only heartache until she meets a disgraced music executive who helps her down the road to fame. Their subsequent collaboration transforms both of them in this charming comedy-drama.

programme.title: The BFG
programme.desc: A lonely orphan befriends a "big friendly giant," and together the pair explore a magical world and collect dreams in this wondrous adaptation of the beloved children's novel. Later, they try to warn the Queen of England about the threat posed by the other giants, who, unlike the vegetarian BFG, eat children.

programme.title: Sense and Sensibility
programme.desc: Oscar-nominated adaptation of Jane Austen's novel about the still-single Dashwood sisters and how they cope with men, marriage and money after their father dies. The screenplay (written by star Emma Thompson) was the sole Oscar winner out of seven nominations.

programme.title: Jerry & Marge Go Large
programme.desc: Jerry Selbee stumbles upon a mathematical hole in the Massachusetts lottery and recruits his wife, Marge, to help him secure the hefty cash prize.

programme.title: Gangster Squad
programme.desc: An elite police squad fights to save the city of Los Angeles from a power-hungry East Coast mobster in this riveting detective film set in the 1940s.

programme.title: A Time to Kill
programme.desc: A hard-hitting, well-acted adaptation of John Grisham's first novel about brutality and racism. When his 10-year-old is assaulted by two racist thugs, Carl Lee Hailey takes justice into his own hands, and young lawyer Jake Brigance is called upon to defend Hailey in court.

programme.title: We Were Soldiers
programme.desc: The star (Mel Gibson) and writer (Randall Wallace) of "Braveheart" reunited for this powerful war epic based on a true story. Gibson plays Lt. Col. Hal Moore, who leads U.S. troops into one of the first and bloodiest battles in Vietnam in November 1965. Madeleine Stowe, Sam Elliott, Greg Kinnear, Chris Klein, Barry Pepper, Keri Russell.

programme.title: How to Be a Latin Lover
programme.desc: In this hilarious comedy, a past-his-prime Latin lover moves in with his sister and her son after his wife leaves him. As he teaches his nephew how to play the game of seduction, he vows to return to his lifestyle of being a kept man for an older woman.

programme.title: Wonderful Time of the Year, A
programme.desc: The Marsh family is getting together for their first Christmas Eve after three years of pandemic lockdown.

programme.desc: Oscar-nominated adaptation of Jane Austen's novel about the still-single Dashwood sisters and how they cope with men, marriage and money after their father dies. The screenplay (written by star Emma Thompson) was the sole Oscar winner out of seven nominations.

programme.title: Bridget Jones's Diary
programme.desc: Texan Renee Zellweger boasts a perfect English accent in this delightful adaptation of Helen Fielding's novel. She plays Bridget, a London "singleton" desperate to lose weight, cut down on her vices and find Mr. Right. The film chronicles her romantic entanglements with two gents: her playboy boss (Hugh Grant) and a snooty lawyer (Colin Firth). Jim Broadbent, Gemma Jones.

programme.title: Feast of Love
programme.desc: Bittersweet, multilayered treat features a standout performance by Morgan Freeman, who acts as a kind of all-seeing commentator who regales viewers with his observations on the relationship complications running rampant in his Oregon town awash with lovestruck romantics.

programme.title: The Long Kiss Goodnight
programme.desc: Geena Davis stars in this action-packed thriller about a schoolteacher with amnesia. When a car accident triggers her memory, she teams with a PI to uncover her past, and finds she was a cold-blooded assassin for the CIA. Samuel L. Jackson, Patrick Malahide, Craig Bierko, David Morse.

programme.desc: Denna mörka svenska skräckfilm följer vänskapen mellan en mobbad tolvåring och hans nya granne – en egendomlig ung flicka som råkar vara en vampyr.

programme.title: And So It Goes
programme.desc: In this endearing comedy-drama, a selfish real-estate agent is forced to care for his estranged son's 9-year-old daughter, and attempts to pawn her off on his kindly neighbor. In time, the little girl brings the two contentious adults together.

programme.title: All I Want for Christmas (2021)
programme.desc: A young girl stumbles upon a Christmas caper involving a fleet of small robots that just might not be the toys they seem, while helping several friends get Santa's attention for putting them on the naughty list.

programme.title: Victoria
programme.desc: In this stunning thriller shot in one continuous and unedited take, a beautiful Spanish party girl in Berlin unwittingly becomes an accessory to a bank robbery after she befriends a group of men at a bar.

programme.title: Ms. Purple
programme.desc: Two estranged Korean-American siblings reconnect as their father's life draws to an end. The sister, a karaoke hostel working in Los Angeles' Koreatown, is forced to ask her brother for help when their father's live-in nurse makes an unexpected exit.

programme.title: Chloe
programme.desc: In this erotically charged drama, Catherine (Julianne Moore) suspects her husband David (Liam Neeson) may be cheating on her, so she hires a prostitute named Chloe (Amanda Seyfried) to flirt with him and report back to her about how he responds. However, Catherine eventually finds herself drawn to Chloe and the stories she shares of her erotic encounters with David.

programme.title: Zola
programme.desc: This comedy-drama film is inspired by the Twitter thread that went viral in 2015. The women aim to reach Florida and earn money by dancing in various strip clubs. However, they run into several mishaps and misadventures as they travel with Stefani's male companions: her boyfriend Derrek and her pimp named X.

programme.title: Happily N'Ever After
programme.desc: When the wizard of Fairy Tale Land goes on vacation, Cinderella's wicked stepmother mounts a takeover, endangering various storybook happy endings. This delightful animated film features the voices of Sigourney Weaver and Sarah Michelle Gellar. Other voices include Freddie Prinze Jr., Andy Dick, Wallace Shawn, Patrick Warburton and George Carlin. Directed by Paul J. Bolger.

programme.title: Happily N'ever After 2: Snow White - Another Bite at the Apple
programme.desc: A teenage Snow White who would rather hang out with fairy-tale friends than lend a hand to the peasants soon realizes she's the one who will need help when a witch intends to wed her father and take control of the entire kingdom.

programme.title: Ghostbusters: Afterlife
programme.desc: Single mother Callie seeks a fresh start with her two children, moving her family to a rural midwestern town. Yet they soon experience a host of supernatural circumstances, unveiling a strange connection to the children's eccentric grandfather. Based on the 1984 cult classic film.

programme.title: Weird Science
programme.desc: A pair of high-school geeks who are hapless with members of the opposite sex create what they believe is the ideal woman using a computer, and then a lightning storm brings that woman to life.

programme.title: Sex Tape
programme.desc: In this hilarious comedy, a married couple go on a mad dash to recover a sex tape of theirs that accidentally went viral. However, their desperate race reveals more about them than their steamy video.

programme.title: Road Trip
programme.desc: Tom Green's film debut casts him as a perpetual college student narrating the raucous odyssey of four university buddies as they make their way from Ithaca, N.Y., to Austin. Their goal: retrieve an illicit video, which was mailed by mistake. Breckin Meyer, Seann William Scott, Amy Smart, Paulo Costanzo, DJ Qualls, Rachel Blanchard.

programme.title: French Exit
programme.desc: Due to financial incapacity after her husband's death, aging socialite Frances is forced to move out of her luxurious Manhattan apartment and into a small, empty flat in Paris with her son Malcolm and their pet cat. As they try to rebuild their lives, they meet a plethora of colorful characters: the lonely Mme. Reynard, psychic Madeleine, and private detective Julius.

programme.desc: Rowdy friends throw a bachelor party for a groom-to-be, whose future bride infiltrates the bash to test his fidelity. Meanwhile, her rich daddy does his best to stop the wedding.

programme.title: In Her Shoes
programme.desc: Toni Collette and Cameron Diaz shine as a pair of mismatched sisters in this touching character study. Collette is the sensible, driven one, and Diaz is an irresponsible, self-centered party girl who may have stepped on her sibling's toes once too often. Shirley MacLaine is excellent as their grandmother, a Florida retiree whom the women thought was dead. Directed by Curtis Hanson. Mark Feuerstein, Ken Howard, Candice Azzara, Norman Lloyd, Francine Beers.

programme.title: The Meddler
